name: CRITICAL: Race Condition in Concurrent Item Increments
description: When multiple clients attempt to increment the price or quantity of an Item simultaneously, updates are occasionally lost. Identify the race condition in the memory store and resolve it using a Mutex or Atomic operation. The Red Test must spawn 100 concurrent goroutines to trigger the race condition reliably.
expected_behavior: Item updates are atomic. Final counts must match the number of total increments without loss.
